verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The heavens declare
The glory of God
And all of the world
Will join the praise
His wonders proclaim

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The oceans and skies
Lift up their voice
And all He has made
Will rise to bless
The King of all kings

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Let us adore Him
Let us adore Him
Jesus Christ is the Lord
Come and behold Him
Bow down before Him
Jesus Christ is the Lord
